# Util <%= classify(name) %>

This library contains utility functions for the <%= domain %> domain.

## Usage

Import utilities in your components and services:

```typescript
import { <%= camelize(name) %> } from '@<%= app %>/<%= domain %>/util-<%= name %>';
```

## Structure

- `src/lib/<%= name %>.ts` - Utility functions
- `src/lib/<%= name %>.spec.ts` - Utility tests
- `src/public-api.ts` - Public API exports
